original_text: So Saul returned from pursuing after David and went against the Philistines. Therefore that place was called the Rock of Escape.
korean_text: 이에 사울이 다윗 뒤쫓기를 그치고 돌아와 블레셋 사람들을 치러 갔으므로 그 곳을 셀라하마느곳이라 칭하니라

sentences.original_text: So Saul returned from pursuing after David
Therefore that place was called the Rock of Escape.
